text: DCE may refer to: == Science == * Dichloroethanes, organic solvents * Dichloroethenes, also called dichloroethylene, organic solvents * Dynamic contrast enhanced, a type of perfusion MRI == Computing == * Data circuit- terminating equipment, also called data communication(s) equipment or data carrier equipment * Data Center Ethernet * Distributed Computing Environment, a specification from The Open Group * Dead code elimination, a kind of compiler optimization * Digital Consumer Enablement, a non-neutral term for Digital rights management == Organisations == * Delhi College of Engineering, University of Delhi, India * Dalian Commodity Exchange * Drum Corps Europe == Other uses == * Daly Cherry-Evans * Digital currency exchanger
title: DCE
